title: The Happiness Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Western, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A cozy all-organic breakfast/lunch place that also does take-away meals with at least one (either vegan or vegetarian) option; please inquire. Has a wide range of vegan pastries, pies, smoothies and smoothie bowls. Also serves sandwiches. Vegan milks are available for coffee and frappuccinos.
